document.full_text: authorities rushed on thursday to complete levees to hold back historic flooding on the missouri river in north and south dakota and urged many residents to evacuate their homes, possibly for two months.
document.title: dakotas rush to build levees ahead of missouri river flood
lines_and_colors: authorities rushed on thursday to complete levees to hold back historic flooding on the missouri river in north and south dakota and urged many residents to evacuate their homes, possibly for two months.
